data.title: Flight Tickets
data.meta_description: Find the best fares for your airline tickets and travel to Thessaloniki, Cyprus, Brussels and France. Visit the SKY express website and book your seat!
data.text:

Astypalaia

Astypalaia is the island you may have never been to but you will always want to visit. Or even if you found yourself there, you didn't have time to get enough of it and definitely want to go back. Justifiably, since...

Athens

Athens … a city that needs no particular introductions! Being the capital city of Greece, Athens is a perennial attraction for visitors from all over the world: the "heart" of Greece, the birthplace of democracy...

Brussels

Despite their suggestive earnestness, due to its status as the seat of the European Parliament and the capital city of the European economy, Brussels also emits an atmosphere of childhood, carefreeness and humor...

Chania

Welcome to the enchanting Chania, one of the most attractive cities in Crete. There is evidence that Chania has always been among the most popular destinations in Greece. Romans, Byzantines, Venetians, Ottomans, all...

Chios

The island of Chios is located very close to Asia Minor, just 15 kilometers from the coast of Turkey and is the fifth largest island in the Aegean Sea. It is a very beautiful island that is still quite untouched by...

Corfu

Corfu is one of the most beautiful and romantic islands in the Ionian island chain, and also a worthy holder of the title of "Queen of the Ionian sea". From its verdant hills and stately manors, to its idyllic beaches...

Dusseldorf

Dusseldorf, a city in western Germany, is a different and charming tourist destination with a multifarious character and elegance. The city has an impressive historic center, filled with buildings characterized by...

Frankfurt

Frankfurt, one of Germany's largest cities, is a dynamic and sophisticated tourist destination. The enchanting mix of contrasts, from state-of-the-art glass skyscrapers to the beautiful medieval center and the...

Heraklion

Travel to Heraklion, the "metropolis" of Crete and capital city of the largest Greek island. This enchanting location, pure yet fully vibrant at the same time, is one of the most historical cities in the Mediterranean...

Kalymnos

Kalymnos is the fourth largest island of the Dodecanese and is surrounded by small, harsh rocky islets, other uninhabited and others, such as Pserimos and Telendos, with few houses, rooms to let, unique restaurants...

Karpathos

The second largest island in the Dodecanese, Karpathos, stands out for its charming contrasts - lush mountains and dozens of beaches, magical sea views and picturesque villages full of traditions, colours and customs...

Kastoria

The magnificent mansions built by wealthy merchants throughout the city are proof of its great prosperity, as it has developed a strong economic and cultural identity thanks to the fur industry. And like this, among...

Kefalonia

Ideally located in the heart of the Ionian Sea, Cephalonia has inspired many with its beauty and has been inextricably linked to the famous film ""Captain Corelli's Mandolin"". Indeed, wherever you look, you will see...

Kos

Welcome to Kos, the second most popular island of the Dodecanese, famous for its historical landmarks, beautiful beaches and rich vegetation. Thanks to its extensive 5,000-year history, and incorporating the influence...

Kozani

A mountain town with a treasure library dating back centuries, vast fields with the precious Greek red saffron and a small ""Grand Canyon""... These are three reasons why your trip to northern Greece deserves to...

Kythera

Also known as Tsirigo since the Venetian occupation, Kythera is a hidden gem located between the Peloponnese and Crete. Kythera stands out for its medieval architecture, reminiscent of Mani, its remote beaches and its...

Larnaca

Whether you call it Larnaca or Scala, it is still a city that stands as one of Cyprus's true gems. Larnaca is the third largest city on the island, with a population of more than 75,000 residents. Discover Larnaca's...

Lemnos

Lemnos is one of the most beautiful islands on the northern edge of the Aegean. It is an incredible destination for those who wish to explore nature and enjoy the most relaxing holidays of their lives.

Leros

A small, authentic, unexplored island, located in the northern Dodecanese, Leros is a place that when you see it you will feel a different, unique aura that you will not be able to explain.

Lille

Lille is for France what Manchester is to England - the beating heart of the country's industry! So, keeping that in mind, welcome to the industrial center, the 10th most populated city, and the 4th largest...

London

A city with a unique personality, the most cosmopolitan metropolis in Europe with its own special character... If we wanted to talk about a truly multicultural city, it would definitely be London. The term “global...

Lyon

Lyon is the third largest French city and one of the most important urban centers in the whole of France. It is also the second most visited city after Paris and the capital city of French cuisine, home of a great...

Marseille

With its very busy harbor and its vibrant urban energy, Marseille is a homing beacon for visitors who seek a genuine tourist experience. This high-spirited cosmopolitan city is the oldest and second largest city in...

Milan

Charming and undoubtedly impressive, Milan is the richest and most elegant city in Italy - a perfect example of vintage romance that meets and blends with modern urban reality. In a country full of landscapes and...

Milos

When you hear about Milos, the famous Venus certainly comes to mind. And not in vain, since the Goddess of beauty and love generously donated her beauty to the island of Milos and made it one of the most fairytale and...

Munich

It may not often be the first city that comes to mind when you think about travelling to Germany, but Munich is a magical destination with so much to do and see, that you wish you could extend your vacation to enjoy...

Mytilene

Very close to the coast of Turkey, literally a stone's throw from it, is located Lesbos, the ""muse"" of the Northeastern Aegean. Mytilene, the capital of Lesbos, is really the jewel of the island. In fact, it is so...

Nantes

From the Château des ducs de Bretagne (Castle of the Dukes of Brittany) to the exquisite 19th century indoor market of Passage Pommeray, and from the Fine Arts Museum to the majestic and futuristic project of Les...

In the center of the Cyclades, in the heart of the Aegean... That's where you'll land when you visit Naxos. The largest of the Cycladic islands and perhaps one of the most beautiful islands in the Aegean, Naxos is an...

Paris

Romance, relaxed life, beautiful landscapes, imposing sights, well-dressed people, chic shops, delicious, unique flavors... These are some of the ingredients that make up the intoxicating aroma of Paris. A city out of...

Paros

Welcome to Paros, this special island that combines modern and traditional elements in the most unique way, in a mixture of traditional Cycladic architecture, intense nightlife, enchanting beaches, traditional rural...

Prague

Prague ... the city of a hundred spires! As the capital of the Czech Republic, Prague enchants visitors with its stunning gothic, baroque, and renaissance architecture. Wander through the cobblestone streets of the...

Preveza

An island atmosphere, centuries of history, delicious food and more beaches than you can imagine... This is Preveza waiting for you to discover!

Rhodes

The capital of the Dodecanese, Rhodes is one of the most popular and cosmopolitan island destinations in the country. This verdant island of the Sun or island of the Knights, as Rhodes is commonly known, is a...

Rome

A city that will enchant you from the first second, the ""eternal city"" as it is called... Rome is without a doubt one of the most beautiful cities in the world. Every year, millions of tourists come from all over...

Samos

If you are looking for the destination of your next vacation, we have the best suggestion... One of the most beautiful islands of the Eastern Aegean, Samos! This brilliant gem stands out for the lush green natural...

Santorini

Enchanting and with much photographed sunsets, thousands of images and memories painted in blue, red and gold, endless romances, amazing food … Santorini is all this and more! Many artists have tried over the years to...

Sitia

In the eastern part of Crete you will find the enchanting Sitia. A place that seduces anyone who visits and invites them to explore it inch by inch. Shiny, blue beaches, unique archaeological sites, exotic palm trees...

Skiathos

Skyros

It may not be the first destination that comes to mind when planning a leisure trip to Greece. But it is certainly the destination that will engrave in your mind the most intense and authentic images, flavors, smells...

Sofia

Bulgaria's capital, Sofia, is a living canvas depicting the past, present and future of its people, land and culture. The architecture, cuisine and lifestyle of the locals reflect the Roman, Greek and Ottoman...

Syros

The Aristocrat of the Aegean and Lady of the Cyclades... A diamond ""born"" in the heart of the Aegean, enchanting anyone who visits it with its dazzling beauty. So, welcome to Syros!

Warsaw

Warsaw, the capital of Poland, is an impressive tourist destination that will offer you a diversity of experiences. The city developed on the bank of the Vistula River, offering a stunning view and many attractions.

Yerevan

Zakynthos

Zakynthos is one of the most exotic Greek islands. Stretched in the heart of the enchanting Ionian Sea, it boasts a wonderful natural landscape and some of the most beautiful beaches in Greece. Exploring Zakynthos...
